title.rendered: “Important IDF Alert: Home Front Command Siren Test Today at Kibbutz Parod and Kfar Shammai”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A Home Front Command siren test will take place today (Tuesday) at Kibbutz Parod and at Kfar Shammai

The Home Front Command’s siren test will take place today (Tuesday) at 10:05 AM at Kibbutz Parod, and at 12:05 PM at Kfar Shammai.

If a real alert is activated, an additional rising and falling siren will sound, and an alert will be simultaneously distributed on the Home Front Command’s beeper and via additional alert means.

Further information can be found at the Home Front Command Center at phone number 104, through WhatsApp messages to phone number 052-9104104, at the national portal at oref.org.il, and on social networks.
